description:
# 1 Bunji ran away from home after arguing with Mom. With nowhere for him to go, his friends, who knew what happened, made a secret base together. They can just live in there! That`s the story. #2 On the morning of Valentine`s Day, Mom`s deadline is closing in. Mr. Mizunuma lends a hand to wrap Fumi`s chocolate and keeps her company to give them out, but... #3 The whole family comes down with a fever. They want to have something that`s refreshing, but... That`s what they thought, but what Dad ordered for takeout is garlic pork ribs with thick noodles and... #4 Mom comes back home late because of work. Mom goes into a dark room and turns the light on… What greets her is a troop of dolls and stuffed toys that Bunji placed there with a note that says welcome back...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Time to Come Back / Obligated Chocolate / Katsu Curry / Welcome Back Troop
帰る時間 / 世話チョコ / カツカレー / おかえりなさい隊
